description: This schema contains classes that are completely generic. These classes should only be used when there is not enough context to pick something more specific.

Callout.description: A generic:DetailingSymbol that calls out a reference to another bis:Drawing.

DetailCallout.description: A generic:Callout that calls out a reference to a detail drawing.
DetailCallout.label: Detail Callout

DetailingSymbol.description: A graphical detailing symbol that is placed on a bis:Drawing or bis:Sheet.
DetailingSymbol.label: Detailing Symbol

Document.description: The generic:Document class is used for bis:Document elements which cannot be further classified. More-specific bis:Document subclasses should be used wherever possible.

ElevationCallout.description: A generic:Callout that calls out a reference to an elevation drawing.
ElevationCallout.label: Elevation Callout

Graphic3d.description: The generic:Graphic3d class is a concrete subclass of bis:GraphicalElement3d that can be used for generic 3D graphics which cannot be further classified. More-specific bis:GraphicalElement3d subclasses should be used wherever possible.
Graphic3d.label: 3D Graphic

GraphicalModel3d.description: A container for persisting bis:GraphicalElement3d instances.
GraphicalModel3d.label: 3D Graphical Model

GraphicalType2d.description: The generic:GraphicalType2d class is used for bis:GraphicalType2d elements which cannot be further classified. More-specific bis:GraphicalType2d subclasses should be used wherever possible.
GraphicalType2d.label: 2D Graphical Type

PhysicalMaterial.description: The generic:PhysicalMaterial class is used for bis:PhysicalMaterial elements which cannot be further classified. More-specific bis:PhysicalMaterial subclasses should be used wherever possible.
PhysicalMaterial.label: Physical Material

PhysicalObject.description: The generic:PhysicalObject class is used for bis:PhysicalElements which cannot be further classified. More-specific bis:PhysicalElement subclasses should be used wherever possible.
PhysicalObject.label: Physical Object

PhysicalType.description: The generic:PhysicalType class is used for bis:PhysicalType elements which cannot be further classified. More-specific bis:PhysicalType subclasses should be used wherever possible.
PhysicalType.label: Physical Type

PlanCallout.description: A generic:Callout that calls out a reference to a plan drawing.
PlanCallout.label: Plan Callout

SectionCallout.description: A generic:Callout that calls out a reference to a section drawing.
SectionCallout.label: Section Callout

SpatialLocation.description: The generic:SpatialLocation class is used for bis:SpatialLocationElements which cannot be further classified. More-specific bis:SpatialLocationElement subclasses should be used wherever possible.
SpatialLocation.label: Spatial Location

TitleText.description: A generic:DetailingSymbol that contains title text.
TitleText.label: Title Text

ViewAttachmentLabel.description: A generic:DetailingSymbol that contains a view attachment label.
ViewAttachmentLabel.label: View Attachment Label

properties.description: Defines the area on the sheet that contains annotations relevant to the View Attachment.
properties.label: Clip Geometry
properties.name: ClipGeometry

name: Generic
